Function# sec_protocol_options_set_tls_sct_enabled(_:_:)

iOS 12.0+iPadOS 12.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 12.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 5.0+

```
func sec_protocol_options_set_tls_sct_enabled(
    _ options: sec_protocol_options_t,
    _ sct_enabled: Bool
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_options_set_tls_sct_enabled(_:_:)#parameters)

`options`A `sec_protocol_options_t` instance.

`sct_enabled`Flag to enable or disable SCT support.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Security/sec_protocol_options_set_tls_sct_enabled(_:_:)#discussion)

Enable or disable SCT (signed certificate timestamp) support.
